idea-plugin.name: Fastnode Code AutoComplete: Python, JavaScript, Go
idea-plugin.description:
AI-powered coding assistant featuring Python, Go and JavaScript code completion snippets, advanced function signatures, and instant documentation. Code faster and stay in flow with Fastnode Autocomplete.

Features

Completions Powered by Machine Learning

Fastnode’s code completions are powered by machine learning models trained on over 25 million open-source code files. Fastnode also runs locally. Your code is private and does not leave your machine.

Instant Code Documentation

Get instant documentation for the symbol underneath your cursor so you save time searching for Python docs (not yet available for JavaScript docs).

Supports Most Code Editors

Fastnode works with .py .go .js .jsx .vue files in the following code editors:

  • IntelliJ IDEA
  • Webstorm
  • Goland
  • VS Code
  • PyCharm
  • Spyder
  • Sublime
  • Vim
  • Atom
  • JupyterLab
  • JupyterHub

Learn more about how Fastnode heightens IntelliJ IDEA’s capabilities at khulnasoft.com/integrations/intellij.

Requirements

This plugin requires the Fastnode desktop app, which you will be prompted to install if it’s not already present.

Use another editor? Check out Fastnode’s other editor integrations.

Installing the Fastnode Engine

The Fastnode desktop app needs to be installed in order for the package to work properly. The package itself provides the frontend that interfaces with the Fastnode Engine, which performs all the code analysis and machine learning 100% locally on your computer. (No code is sent to a cloud server.)

macOS Instructions

  1. Download the installer and open the downloaded .dmg file.
  2. Drag the Fastnode icon into the Applications folder.
  3. Run Fastnode.app to start the Fastnode Engine.

Windows Instructions

  1. Download the installer and run the downloaded .exe file.
  2. The installer should run the Fastnode Engine automatically after installation is complete.

Linux Instructions

  1. Visit khulnasoft.com/linux to install Fastnode.
  2. The installer should run the Fastnode Engine automatically after installation is complete.

Troubleshooting

Check our help center for the most recent installation guide for IntelliJ and the troubleshooting guide.

About Fastnode

Fastnode is built by a team in San Francisco devoted to making programming easier and more enjoyable for all. Follow Fastnode on Twitter and get the latest news and programming tips on the Fastnode Blog. Fastnode has been featured in Wired, VentureBeat, The Next Web, and TechCrunch.
idea-plugin.change-notes: • Support more file extensions for Fastnode completions.

Changed

  • The first release on the JetBrains marketplace.
